Name: Bitcoin Trader
About the game: In this game, you have a fascinating journey into the world of cryptocurrencies. Make exchanges on the stock exchange, do airdrops, and of course extract the cryptocurrency from mining! Features: - Steam of achievement - Nice graphic and music - Endless gameplay - Casual game - This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5
